verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> who <S%H6>destroy<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of my <S%H4830>pasture!<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> against the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> who <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H5971>people:<s%> You have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and driven them <S%H5080>away,<s%> and have not <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H6485>them;<s%> behold, I will visit on you the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of my <S%H6629>flock<s%> out of all the <S%H776>countries<s%> where I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H7725>them,<s%> and will bring them again to their <S%H5116>folds;<s%> and they shall be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply.<s%>

I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> over <S%H7462>them,<s%> who shall feed <S%H3372>them;<s%> and they shall fear no <S%H2865>more,<s%> nor be dismayed, neither shall any be <S%H6485>lacking,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3117>Behold,<s%> the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6780>Branch,<s%> and he shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> as <S%H4428>king<s%> and deal <S%H7919>wisely,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be <S%H3467>saved,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely;<s%> and this is his <S%H8034>name<s%> by which he shall be <S%H7121>called:<s%> Yahweh our <S%H3072>righteousness.<s%>

<S%H3117>Therefore,<s%> behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that they shall no more <S%H559>say,<s%> As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

<S%H3068>but,<s%> As Yahweh <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who brought <S%H5927>up<s%> and who <S%H935>led<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> and from all the <S%H776>countries<s%> where I had <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H3427>them.<s%> They shall dwell in their own <S%H127>land.<s%>

Concerning the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me is <S%H7665>broken,<s%> all my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H7363>shake;<s%> I am like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and like a <S%H1397>man<s%> whom <S%H3196>wine<s%> has <S%H5674>overcome,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and because of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

For the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H5003>adulterers;<s%> for <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H423>swearing<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourns;<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> are dried <S%H3001>up.<s%> Their <S%H4794>course<s%> is <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and their might is not <S%H1369>right;<s%>

for both <S%H5030>prophet<s%> and <S%H3548>priest<s%> are <S%H2610>profane;<s%> <S%H1004>yes,<s%> in my house have I <S%H4672>found<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Therefore their <S%H1870>way<s%> shall be to them as <S%H2519>slippery<s%> places in the <S%H653>darkness:<s%> they shall be driven <S%H1760>on,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H935>therein;<s%> for I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H8141>them,<s%> even the year of their <S%H6486>visitation,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8604>folly<s%> in the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and caused my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H8582>err.<s%>

In the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> also I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a horrible <S%H8186>thing:<s%> they commit <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H8267>lies;<s%> and they <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> so that <S%H376>none<s%> does <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H7451>wickedness:<s%> they are all of them become to me as <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and its <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> as <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> concerning the <S%H5030>prophets:<s%> <S%H398>Behold,<s%> I will feed them with <S%H3939>wormwood,<s%> and make them <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H7219>gall;<s%> for from the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H2613>ungodliness<s%> gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> into all the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H8085>Don't<s%> listen to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to <S%H1891>you:<s%> they teach you vanity; they <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and not out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H559>continually<s%> to those who <S%H5006>despise<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh has <S%H1696>said,<s%> You shall have <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and to everyone who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of his own <S%H3820>heart<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> No <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall come on <S%H935>you.<s%>

For who has <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H5475>council<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that he should <S%H7200>perceive<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H1697>word?<s%> who has <S%H7181>marked<s%> my <S%H1697>word,<s%> and heard <S%H8085>it?<s%>

<S%H5591>Behold,<s%> the storm of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> his <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> has gone <S%H3318>forth.<s%> <S%H2342>Yes,<s%> a whirling <S%H5591>storm.<s%> It shall <S%H2342>burst<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

The <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall not <S%H7725>return,<s%> until he has <S%H6213>executed,<s%> and until he have <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H4209>intents<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart:<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H995>understand<s%> it <S%H998>perfectly.<s%>
I <S%H7971>sent<s%> not these <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> yet they <S%H7323>ran:<s%> I <S%H1696>didn't<s%> speak to <S%H5012>them,<s%> yet they prophesied.

But if they had <S%H5975>stood<s%> in my <S%H5475>council,<s%> then had they caused my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%> and had <S%H7725>turned<s%> them from their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and from the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>
Am I a <S%H430>God<s%> at <S%H7138>hand,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and not a <S%H430>God<s%> afar <S%H7350>off?<s%>

Can <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> himself in secret <S%H4565>places<s%> so that I shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5002>him?<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H4392>Don't<s%> I fill <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> what the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I have <S%H2492>dreamed,<s%> I have <S%H2492>dreamed.<s%>

How long shall this <S%H3426>be<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>lies,<s%> even the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of the <S%H8649>deceit<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart?<s%>

who <S%H2803>think<s%> to cause my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7911>forget<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> by their <S%H2472>dreams<s%> which they <S%H5608>tell<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> as their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H7911>forgot<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> who has a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> let him <S%H5608>tell<s%> a <S%H2472>dream;<s%> and he who has my <S%H1697>word,<s%> let him <S%H1696>speak<s%> my <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H571>faithfully.<s%> What is the <S%H8401>straw<s%> to the <S%H1250>wheat?<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H1697>Isn't<s%> my word <S%H3541>like<s%> <S%H784>fire?<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and like a <S%H6360>hammer<s%> that <S%H6327>breaks<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%> in <S%H6327>pieces?<s%>
<S%H5030>Therefore,<s%> behold, I am against the prophets, <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H1589>steal<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> from his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>
<S%H5030>Behold,<s%> I am against the prophets, <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H3947>use<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues,<s%> and <S%H5001>say,<s%> He <S%H5002>says.<s%>

<S%H5012>Behold,<s%> I am against those who prophesy <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and do <S%H5608>tell<s%> <S%H5971>them,<s%> and cause my people to <S%H8582>err<s%> by their <S%H8267>lies,<s%> and by their vain <S%H6350>boasting:<s%> yet I <S%H7971>didn't<s%> send <S%H6680>them,<s%> nor commanded <S%H3276>them;<s%> neither do they profit this <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H3276>all,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

When this <S%H5971>people,<s%> or the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> or a <S%H3548>priest,<s%> shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, What is the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> Then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H4853>them,<s%> What burden! I will <S%H5203>cast<s%> you <S%H5002>off,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

As for the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> who shall <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I will even <S%H6485>punish<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

You shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H376>everyone<s%> to his <S%H251>brother,<s%> What has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>answered?<s%> <S%H3068>and,<s%> What has Yahweh <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>

You shall <S%H2142>mention<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> no <S%H376>more:<s%> for every man's own <S%H1697>word<s%> shall be his <S%H4853>burden;<s%> for you have <S%H2015>perverted<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
You shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> What has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>you?<s%> and, What has Yahweh <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>

<S%H518>But<s%> if you <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Because you <S%H559>say<s%> this <S%H1697>word,<s%> The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, You shall not <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>

<S%H5377>therefore,<s%> behold, I will utterly <S%H5382>forget<s%> <S%H5203>you,<s%> and I will cast you <S%H5892>off,<s%> and the city that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> away from my <S%H6440>presence:<s%>
and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%> on <S%H5769>you,<s%> and a perpetual <S%H3640>shame,<s%> which shall not be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>
